nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(`Registered Accounts`) as 'Registered Accounts' from MYSQLCustomerEntityRegisteredUsers since this month COMPARE WITH 1 month ago
SELECT uniqueCount(`Order ID`) as 'Total Orders' FROM MYSQLSalesOrderByProduct   since this month COMPARE WITH 1 month ago
SELECT latest(`Active Users`) from  MYSQLCustomerEntityActiveUsers
FROM PageView select uniqueCount(session) as 'Total Page Views' since 3 minutes ago
SELECT percentage(count(result), where result = 'FAILED') as 'Downtime (%)' from SyntheticCheck since  this month
SELECT uniqueCount(customer_email) as 'Abandoned Carts' FROM MYSQLAbandonedCarts
FROM MySQLSalesOrderByStatus SELECT latest(total_billed_amount_by_status) as 'Total Revenue ($)' WHERE order_status = 'complete' TIMESERIES AUTO COMPARE WITH 1 month ago

widgets.title: Revenue at Risk due to Website Downtime - per year ($)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) * (SELECT (latest(AverageRevenue) / 365) / 86400 AS 'Average Revenue Per Second' FROM MYSQLRevenuePerMonthAndYear WHERE Year IN ({{Year}})) from SyntheticCheck where result = 'FAILED' facet yearOf(timestamp)
SELECT uniqueCount(order_id) AS 'Cancelled Orders' FROM MYSQLSalesOrderDetails where status ='canceled'
SELECT latest(newCustomers), LATEST(returningCustomers) from MYSQLReturningCustomers, MYSQLNewCustomers

widgets.title: Revenue at Risk due to Website Downtime - per month ($)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) * (SELECT (latest(AverageRevenue) / 365) / 86400 AS 'Average Revenue Per Second' FROM MYSQLRevenuePerMonthAndYear WHERE Year IN ({{Year}})) from SyntheticCheck where result = 'FAILED' facet monthOf(timestamp)

FROM Transaction SELECT funnel(customerId as 'Customer', where name = 'WebTransaction/Action/catalog/product/view' as 'View Product', where name like 'WebTransaction/Action/checkout/cart/add' as 'Add to Cart', where name like 'WebTransaction/Action/checkout/onepage/success' as 'Success Page')
SELECT latest(CountOfOrderByMethod) FROM MySQLSalesOrderPaymentCount FACET PaymentMethodType

widgets.title: Revenue at Risk due to Website Downtime - per day ($)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) * (SELECT (latest(AverageRevenue) / 365) / 86400 AS 'Average Revenue Per Second' FROM MYSQLRevenuePerMonthAndYear WHERE Year IN ({{Year}})) from SyntheticCheck where result = 'FAILED' facet dateOf(timestamp)

widgets.title: Revenue at Risk due to Slow Page Load ($)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT (average(duration) - 2) * (SELECT (latest(AverageRevenue) / 365) / 86400 AS 'Average Revenue per Second' FROM MYSQLRevenuePerMonthAndYear) AS 'Revenue at Risk due to Slow Page Load ($)' from PageView

rawConfiguration.text:
# Revenue at Stake
Keeping track of downtime and lost revenue can help businesses quantify the impact of these issues.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(duration) from SyntheticCheck where result = 'FAILED' since 12 month ago until today facet MonthOf(timestamp) TIMESERIES
SELECT latest(duration) from SyntheticCheck where result = 'FAILED' since 12 month ago until today facet MonthOf(timestamp)

widgets.title: Revenue at Risk due to Downtime ($)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) * (SELECT (latest(AverageRevenue) / 365) / 86400 AS 'Average Revenue Per Second' FROM MYSQLRevenuePerMonthAndYear WHERE Year IN (2023)) from SyntheticCheck where result = 'FAILED' facet monthOf(timestamp)
SELECT average(duration) as 'seconds'  from PageView TIMESERIES
SELECT average(duration) as 'seconds'  from PageView

widgets.title: Revenue at Risk due to Slow Page Load ($)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT (average(duration) - 2) * (SELECT (latest(AverageRevenue) / 365) / 86400 AS 'Average Revenue per Second' FROM MYSQLRevenuePerMonthAndYear) AS 'Revenue at Risk due to Slow Page Load ($)' from PageView
SELECT latest(`Registered Accounts`) as 'Total Customers' from MYSQLCustomerEntityRegisteredUsers
SELECT LATEST(newCustomers) from MYSQLNewCustomers
SELECT LATEST(returningCustomers) from MYSQLReturningCustomers
from MySQLSalesOrderCumulative select latest(average_grand_total) as 'Average order value ($)'
FROM MYSQLUnregisteredCustomers SELECT uniqueCount(customer_email) AS 'Guest Users'
FROM MYSQLSalesOrderByUnregisteredCustomers2 SELECT latest(`Total Order Ids`) AS 'Number of Orders', latest(`Grand Total Sum`) AS 'Grand Total ($)'
SELECT latest(`Registered Accounts`) as 'Total Customers' from MYSQLCustomerEntityRegisteredUsers  TIMESERIES since this week compare with 1 week ago
SELECT productID as 'Product ID',ProductName,conversionRateInPercent AS'Conversion Rate (%)'from MYSQLConversionRate

rawConfiguration.text:
# Cart Abandonment
With the help of Cart Abandonment section you can easily track your Abandoned carts, order value, product and quantity.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(customer_email) as 'Abandoned Carts' FROM MYSQLAbandonedCarts TIMESERIES auto COMPARE WITH 1 month ago
SELECT latest(subtotal) as 'Abandoned Order Value ($)'FROM MYSQLAbandonedCarts
SELECT latest(Products)  as 'Abandoned Products'FROM MYSQLAbandonedCarts
SELECT latest(Quantity) as 'Abandoned Quantity'FROM MYSQLAbandonedCarts
FROM MySQLSalesOrderCumulative SELECT latest(grand_total_sum) AS 'Total Order Value ($)'
from MySQLSalesOrderCumulative select latest(average_grand_total) as 'Average order value ($)'
SELECT uniqueCount(`Order ID`) as 'Orders Count' FROM MYSQLSalesOrderByProduct since this month compare with 1 month ago
FROM MySQLSalesOrderCumulative select latest(total_order_item_count) as 'Orders Item Count' since this month COMPARE WITH  1 month ago
FROM MySQLSalesOrderByStatus,MYSQLSalesOrderByProduct SELECT (filter(latest(total_orders), where order_status = 'complete')/uniqueCount(`Order ID`)) * 100 as 'Order Rate'
FROM MySQLSalesOrderByStatus,MYSQLSalesOrderByProduct SELECT (filter(latest(total_orders), where order_status = 'canceled')/uniqueCount(`Order ID`)) * 100 as 'Order Cancellation Rate'

widgets.title: Total Order Value ($) - By Order Status

nrqlQueries.query: FROM MySQLSalesOrderByStatus SELECT latest(total_billed_amount_by_status) FACET order_status
FROM MySQLSalesOrderByStatus SELECT latest(total_orders) FACET order_status

widgets.title: Total Orders Received compared with 1 month ago

nrqlQueries.query: FROM MYSQLSalesOrderByProduct SELECT uniqueCount(`Order ID`) as 'Total Orders Received' since this month COMPARE WITH 1 month ago TIMESERIES
SELECT average(grand_total)as'Average Order Value' FROM MYSQLSalesOrderByRegion facet `Region Name`
SELECT latest(`Registered Accounts`) as 'Signup' from MYSQLCustomerEntityRegisteredUsers
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%view%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%cart/add%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%savePaymentInformationAndPlaceOrder%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%onepage/success%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT average(duration) as 'seconds' from Transaction where name like '%view%' TIMESERIES
SELECT average(duration) as 'seconds' from Transaction where name like '%add%' TIMESERIES
SELECT average(duration) as 'seconds' from Transaction where name like '%savePaymentInformationAndPlaceOrder%' TIMESERIES
SELECT average(duration) as 'seconds' from Transaction where name like '%success%' TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average Order Value ($) by Customer Group

nrqlQueries.query: from MYSQLSalesOrderByCustomerGroup select latest(grand_total_average_of_all_orders) facet if(customer_group_code = 'General','Registered Users','Guest Users')

widgets.title: Average Order Value ($)  by Category Name

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(average_order_total) from MYSQLSalesOrderByCategory facet Category
FROM MYSQLSalesOrderByProduct SELECT latest(`Order Created Date`), latest(`Order Quantity`) AS 'Quantity Ordered', latest(`Grand Total`) AS 'Order Value ($)' limit 10 FACET `Order ID`

FROM MYSQLTopTenSalesOrdersByValue SELECT orderId as 'Order ID', grandTotal as 'Order Value ($)', orderQuantity as 'Quantity Ordered', createdDate as 'Order Created Date' ORDER BY grandTotal DESC SINCE 40 seconds ago

rawConfiguration.text:
# Application Monitoring
 Leverage on New Relic's APM (Application Performance Monitoring) capabilities by setting up errors inbox, average application throughput and apdex score.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from Transaction FACET concat(httpResponseCode, ' Error Code') WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '3%'
SELECT count(*) from Transaction  FACET concat(httpResponseCode, ' Error Code') WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '4%'
SELECT count(*) from Transaction  FACET concat(httpResponseCode, ' Error Code') WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%'
SELECT apdex(apm.service.apdex) as 'App server', apdex(apm.service.apdex.user) as 'End user' FROM Metric where appName like '%magento%' TIMESERIES
SELECT average(newrelic.goldenmetrics.apm.application.throughput) AS 'seconds' from Metric TIMESERIES
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as 'Payment Declines' from Transaction where name ='WebTransaction/Action/paypal/express/cancel' TIMESERIES
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as 'Carts Created' from Transaction where name like '%cart/add%'

rawConfiguration.text:
# Synthetic Monitoring
Synthetic monitoring helps you proactively catch failures of synthetic checks and requests, failed checks by location and execution time.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticRequest WHERE result = 'FAILED'
SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticCheck WHERE result = 'FAILED'
SELECT average(duration) from SyntheticCheck facet locationLabel timeseries
SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticCheck WHERE result = 'FAILED' facet locationLabel

rawConfiguration.text:
# Downtime
Synthetic monitoring allows us to track website downtime.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(duration) from SyntheticCheck where result = 'FAILED' since 12 month ago until today facet monthOf(timestamp) TIMESERIES

rawConfiguration.text:
# Browser Monitoring
With the help of Browser Monitoring section you can easily track your Applications load time, browser breakdown, traffic by device type and top ISPs.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(duration, 50) from PageView facet countryCode TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(duration, 50) from PageView FACET deviceType TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(duration, 50) from PageView facet userAgentName TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET userAgentName
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET asnOrganization LIMIT 25
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET deviceType

rawConfiguration.text:
# Latency
Latency helps us to know about average response time and page load time.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(duration) as 'seconds' from PageView TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(newrelic.goldenmetrics.apm.application.responseTimeMs)/1000 as 'Average Response Time (seconds)' TIMESERIES

rawConfiguration.text:
# Infrastructure Monitoring
With the help of Infrastructure Monitoring section you can easily track your CPU usage, disk usage, memory usage and storage usage.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(host.cpuPercent) AS 'CPU used %' FROM Metric TIMESERIES
SELECT latest(host.memoryUsedPercent) AS 'Memory used %' FROM Metric TIMESERIES
SELECT latest(host.disk.usedPercent) as 'Storage used %' FROM Metric TIMESERIES
SELECT latest(host.disk.usedPercent) as 'Used %' FROM Metric FACET device
SELECT latest(appName),latest(duration) FROM Transaction facet name as 'Transactions'
SELECT uniqueCount(order_id) AS 'No. of Completed Carts' FROM MYSQLSalesOrderDetails where status = 'complete'
SELECT uniqueCount(customer_email) as 'No. of Abandoned Carts' FROM MYSQLAbandonedCarts
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%catalog/product/view' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%cart/add%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%checkout/cart/index%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%saveAddressInformation%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Save Payment Information and Place Order

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%savePaymentInformationAndPlaceOrder%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%onepage/success%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%sales/order/history%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like '%sales/order/view%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like  '%wishlist/index/add%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like  '%/wishlist/index/allcart%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like  '%wishlist/index/remove%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like  '%checkout/cart/delete%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(traceId) as '' from Transaction where name like  '%sales/order/cancel%' since today COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM PageView SELECT percentile(backendDuration, 75) AS 'TTFB' WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT count(errorClass) / count(backendDuration) AS 'Javascript Errors/PageView' FROM JavaScriptError, PageView WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
FROM PageView SELECT percentile(backendDuration, 75) AS 'TTFB' WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT count(errorClass) / count(backendDuration) AS 'Javascript Errors/PageView' FROM JavaScriptError, PageView WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageView SELECT percentile(backendDuration, 75) AS 'TTFB' WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
SELECT count(errorClass) / count(backendDuration) AS 'Javascript Errors/PageView' FROM JavaScriptError, PageView WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop'
FROM PageView SELECT percentile(backendDuration, 75) AS 'TTFB' WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType !='Desktop'
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT count(errorClass) / count(backendDuration) AS 'Javascript Errors/PageView' FROM JavaScriptError, PageView WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%.html%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
FROM PageView SELECT percentile(backendDuration, 75) AS 'TTFB' WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT count(errorClass) / count(backendDuration) AS 'Javascript Errors/PageView' FROM JavaScriptError, PageView WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%checkout%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
FROM PageView SELECT percentile(backendDuration, 75) AS 'TTFB' WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType!='Desktop'
SELECT count(errorClass) / count(backendDuration) AS 'Javascript Errors/PageView' FROM JavaScriptError, PageView WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%onepage/success%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'
SELECT count(*) from SyntheticRequest facet domain TIMESERIES auto

widgets.title: Average Response Time (seconds) by Content Type

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(duration) from SyntheticRequest facet contentType TIMESERIES
FROM ElasticsearchClusterSample SELECT latest(cluster.status) AS 'Cluster Status', latest(cluster.nodes) AS 'Cluster Nodes', latest(cluster.dataNodes) AS 'Data Nodes'
select average(duration) from SyntheticRequest facet domain   limit 10

SELECT  filter(average(apm.service.overview.web), WHERE segmentName like 'PHP') as 'PHP', filter(average(apm.service.overview.web), WHERE segmentName like 'MySQL') as 'MySQL' FROM Metric TIMESERIES where appName like '%magento%'

widgets.title: Total vs Idle vs Busy Workers

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT  latest(`apache.server.scoreboard.totalWorkers`) * uniqueCount(entity.name) as 'Total Workers' ,latest(`apache.server.idleWorkers`) * uniqueCount(entity.name) as 'Idle Workers', latest(`apache.server.busyWorkers`) * uniqueCount(entity.name) as 'Busy Workers'FROM Metric WHERE `metricName` IN ('apache.server.scoreboard.totalWorkers','apache.server.idleWorkers', 'apache.server.busyWorkers') TIMESERIES
